Commands.Jump III: Increases BRV based on ATK, then BRV × 1.2 + HP attack  Self: 2 turns Dragoon's Pride  BRV Attack becomes Jump while Dragoon's Pride active
Commands.Jump: Potent ranged BRV attack.  High turn rate
Commands.Fang and Claw: 5-hit ranged BRV attack + HP attack  Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%  Target: Knock Back

Artifacts.Buffed Guard: Raises Defense Power by 10% while buffed
Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Artifacts.Mighty Jump: Raises BRV Damage dealt with Jump by 10%
Artifacts.Mighty Gungnir: Raises BRV Damage dealt with Gungnir by 10%

Passives.Jump III Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Jump III.
Passives.Critical Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after dealing a critical hit.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Gungnir Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Gungnir.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Jump III Charge: Increases the max uses of Jump III by 1.
Passives.Heavenly Assault: Slightly raises Attack when attacking an enemy not targeting self.
Passives.Gungnir Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Gungnir.
Passives.The Soaring Dragoon: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn when BRV equals 0.
Passives.Speed Buff: Slightly raises SPD with active buffs
Passives.Jump III Extension: When using Jump III:   Moderately increased BRV granted based on ATK   Slight Dragoon's Pride boost, duration +2When using Jump:   Moderate damage boost
Passives.Buffed Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
Passives.Gungnir Extension: When using Gungnir:   Becomes 2-hit BRV attack; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage   Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 150%

Weapons.Wind Spear CP: 15: Increases the BRV gain of Jump III and lowers its Action Delay.Extends the duration of Pride of the Dragoon.
Weapons.Kain's Lance CP: 35: Increases the potency of Gungnir and lowers its Action Delay.Grants Small Max BRV Up and Small Attack Up for 6 turns.
Weapons.Dragoon Lance CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Fang and Claw.
